website_summaries.verdict: It's a solid machine, but others on our shortlist have more to offer.
pros: A sleek yet heavy-duty machine that's works for small offices
Available in strip and cross-cut models
cons: Our testers noted that it jams sometimes when shredding 20 sheets of paper at a time
It's also a bit loud when shredding

customer_reviews.title: Shreds really well, otherwise a bad design.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is heavy duty, and shreds quickly into small pieces. Love that it can handle a lot of load. Downside, it is VERY messy, inside the bin, outside the bin, all over the floor. I have to use a vacuum to clean up everytime I shred. It is also very heavy and the hand to pull it is the same handle as the removable bin, so when you go to move the shredder, you accidentaly pull out the shredded bin, clunky. Aggravated because I spent so much on this.
customer_reviews.author: surfdawg

customer_reviews.title: Works good so far, just emptying from the short side is a pain.
customer_reviews.text: This arrived quickly, is sturdy and plows through multiple papers at one time. It automatically stops when not being used. I haven’t had any paper jams yet. It holds a nice amount of paper waste which is great, no constant dumping. So far my only gripe is the machine opens on the side instead of the front (narrow side) so when I push it flat against the wall I need to turn the heavy machine to pull out the bin long ways to empty it. Pulling out a bin the length of the machine instead of the depth is more difficult.
customer_reviews.author: jccwc

customer_reviews.title: 7 years Later With heavy Use, Still Works Like New
customer_reviews.text: I have used this shredder for the last 7 years. 5 days a week this thing has been shredding USPS cardboard type envelopes with ZERO hiccups or problems... Super happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Not Perfect but darned good
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific choice if you have a large number of documents and want something that can do multiple pages at once. I think they claim 20 pages but unlikely it can do that except in pristine documents. The only drawback is the bin is not large enough and you constantly have to tamp down the shreds which means opening up the drawer constantly. Since the shreds don't always stay in the bag, there is a bit of a cleanup problem too but that is true with many shredders. Overall, it is a good choice and at $399.00 a very good value.
customer_reviews.author: LoneTexan

customer_reviews.title: After the first DOA, it has performed flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: My dad and I bought this shredder, because he is a retired lawyer with a lot of old paperwork that needed shredding and a store-brand shredder wasn't going to cut it. The first one we got was dead on arrival, but Amazon quickly sent out a replacement. After that initial hiccup, this has been perfect for his needs. It is a workhorse, able to shred continuously for a long time. Also it never seems to struggle with multiple pages, it handles everything confidently. The best part is the large capacity waste bin, which means less time having to empty it. I would recommend this shredder to anyone with a very large personal need or for most small businesses.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Well, it's a shredder
customer_reviews.text: There's not really much to review about a shredder. Either it shreds or it doesn't shred. This one shreds. It is possible to overload it, and I've done so a few times. Usually, it stops a moment, nibbles at the blockage, and slowly chews through it. When I run pages through it 12-15 at a time, there's never a problem. It's also happy chewing up credit cards. I aways use a shredder bag, otherwise I could see emptying the bin would get to be a pain. With the bag, it doesn't take very much time at all to keep it clean. Very effective product.
customer_reviews.author: Former Tanker

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Fellowes Product -- Workhorse Shredder
customer_reviews.text: We worked our Fellowes 79Ci shredder literally to death. Loved it except the waste bin was so small we were always emptying it. So we took a deep breath and bought this big guy. Wow. The bin holds a tremendous amount of paper, and we're using it with the clear plastic bags provided. That way we can empty the crosscut shreds in the clear bag and it's accepted by our recycle vendor. Cannot believe how many pieces of paper it shreds at one time, so quickly and quietly. We love Fellows products.
customer_reviews.author: HannahD

customer_reviews.title: Great for small offices
customer_reviews.text: We have been purchasing smaller shredders and having to constantly replace every few months. As security issues have grown, we have had to consider larger more pricey shredder. After many hours of investigation, fellowes came out on top every time with power, down time between shreds and capacity. We originally went to other outlets and priced and found what we needed, was a little out of our price range. Someone mentioned checking with amazon and we did. Amazon had the exact same shredder at a much more affordable price that the big name retailer. We are a 9 person office and are average shredders. This works great for our office. I highly recommend this shredder.
customer_reviews.author: A. B. Ins

customer_reviews.title: So much better than the smaller Go EcoLife shredder I replaced
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the smaller Go EcoLife shredder I replaced. Shreds much FASTER than the old shredder. Large wastebasket is nice. If you need a shredder where you can just dump a big pile of paper in it and leave this isn't the one. You are still limited in how much paper you can put in it at one time. For my needs I'm extremely happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Plain Truth

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a much larger commercial shredder in our office with this one and had concerns going to a smaller machine but we are very pleased with how good this one works.
customer_reviews.author: LC AK

customer_reviews.title: Liked but Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This shredder worked great until ONE MONTH PAST the warranty date, then it died! It worked great all the time, we ran a lot of paper through it, shredded many mail survey's for privacy, but now nothing, it won't even pull one sheet through. We are very disappointed to have spent so much time researching and settling on Fellowes only to be without a shredder such a short time later! We will NOT purchase another Fellowes.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: It can handle it.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. This unit handles up to 20 pages (slows a bit sometimes) but powers on through. I had a huge backlog of tax and real estate files that are now recycle. If it slows a bit then, it back up and try it again because it does not jamb. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn S. Widner

customer_reviews.title: A Better Shredder for the Times
customer_reviews.text: It worked as described, however, I was hoping for something better. I still have a large Fellowes that I purchased 8 years ago to shred a mountain of paper that my wife had collected from her mother and which she her self collected for the past 40+ years. That included everything in the envelope including the envelope when it had no info on it. We must have recycled 50 lbs of shredded paper per week that over the years added up to several tons of paper. With identity theif increasing, the cross cut shredded works quite well. If there is more important material, I can always mix it in with noxious materials.
customer_reviews.author: CyberBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Office workhorse
customer_reviews.text: Robust shredder. Much better than the smaller models. You can put in 10-12 pages at a time without it laboring. The key is lubrications after EVERY nag change. Get a large bottle of oil and run a ribbon of it into the shredder slot . As others have noted this unit is definitely NOT quiet during shredding . I have had it for 3 years and it works quite well. It is narrow and fits into a 6" wide spot . I have owned many shredders over the years. This is the best I have had . I can fill up 3-4 bags a day . It just keeps going. Remember the oil !
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Best Shredder for Office Use
customer_reviews.text: Best shredder for office use. We baby ours and don't put everything down it that it claims to shred. DO NOT attempt to shred the steel credit cards. It will ruin any shredder. Instead, send them back to the banking institution and not ruin your shredder. We both two of these shredders after liking the first one so well. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: JCourtney

customer_reviews.title: Destroys unwanted American Express solicitations
customer_reviews.text: This does a great job for general shredding in a home office. Where it shines is in getting rid of those annoying super-thick credit card solicitations (I'm talking to you, AmEx). Even if the envelope is too thick, the shredder just backs up, takes a pause, and starts again until the job is done. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Conroy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shredder: A good choice for a home office
customer_reviews.text: When my old Fellowes shredder finally died, I looked at several shredders before settling on the 125Ci. After a couple of months of use, I like this shredder more than the older one. Shredding action seems to be very smooth. I did learn from the experience of losing the former Fellowes shredder: be careful of how long you let the shredder run. I suspect that the previous shredder died because I would run it for extended periods. I would have been interested in a similar priced shredder which shredded more finely, but never located one.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cole

customer_reviews.title: LASTED 6 MONTHS ONLY
customer_reviews.text: ONLY AFTER 6 MONTHS THE MACHINE IS STUCK AND NOT WORKING. UNBELIEVABLE. WILL CALL CUSTOMER SERVICE AND SEE WHAT'S THE WARRANTY. BUT IT SHOULD LAST MORE THAN 6 MONTHS EVEN WITH REGULAR USAGE. DONT RECOMMEND IT - DONT BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vitor F. Weinman, MD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shredder.
customer_reviews.text: We have been using the shredder for a month now. Works great. Very pleased with the large waste basket which is a time saver. We had a small shredder that required constant stops to empty the waste. So glad we bought the larger shredder.
customer_reviews.author: JD808

customer_reviews.title: Serious Shredder.
customer_reviews.text: This is not the little "home office" shredder you're used to. It's very powerful. It shreds quickly. It can shred a lot in a short period of time. If you're only occasionally shredding a few pieces of paper this is overkill. If you have a larger volume of shredding to do this works great. It can chew through unopened junk mail without a problem. It's a fairly good sized unit so check the dimensions. (it's not going to fit under your desk) Keep a vacuum handy to clean up the bits when you change the bin. Using the shredder bags will make it easier to empty the bin but not mess free.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shredder
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement unit and I’m very pleased with it. It does it’s job with ease and is quiet. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: clabarge

customer_reviews.title: Excelllent product
customer_reviews.text: Works fine and does exactly what I wanted it to do. Great service. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Randy C.

customer_reviews.title: Love the fact that it tells me if I've try ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my home office, where it fits well against the wall. Love the fact that it tells me if I've try to put too many sheets in at a time. It's slower than I would like, but I think that's because it's a cross-cut (rather than just straight-line) shredder - which actually makes it more secure for confidential papers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Still going. Give the blades a shot of WD40 often
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Worked well in heavy shredding environment for a couple weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked well in heavy shredding environment for a couple weeks. Then I think the switch to let it know there is a basket in there-failed. Wouldn’t shred anymore. Pain to return due to the size. Went to another brand. Maybe we just got a lemon?
customer_reviews.author: Bass Face

customer_reviews.title: The shredder at best shreds only seven sheets at a time--many times the ...
customer_reviews.text: The shredder at best shreds only seven sheets at a time--many times the machine would freeze, and I had to press the forward icon to get it to activate again. I was upset to see that the machine did not shred consistently in single strips; there were many shredded clumps. I have returned the machine and do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Burke

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I take security seriously so we shred a lot. This unit is high end for home use (mid-grade overall) but definitely does what we need to do. I was considering a unit with an autofeed feature but it was a weaker unit - that's one feature I'd like to see in one of these mid-grade shredders. It's well built, handles the load as advertised and will last us for years. Overall we love it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: outstanding
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews, I had a starter model that broke, this one is right for the home or office. Just as stated, it does multiple pages at one time, I do not go above 6 pages in feeding a single group of pages , I like the auto reverse when the paper feed is too thick to reverse the jam. The bag inserts used to collect the shredded paper are fine, but I the 33 gallon Clear Trash Bags form Costco work event better.
customer_reviews.author: Tennis Player

customer_reviews.title: 99% Jam-Proof
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent shredder, and it takes paper as fast as you can feed it. I did a 6 inch high stack of paper in 10 minutes. I managed to jam it once, and had to pull out the wad of paper manually (would not reverse it out). Other than that, it worked flawlessly. Very quiet. It fills the waste basket pretty fast, though.
customer_reviews.author: Geronimo

customer_reviews.title: Loved it for 2 years - then it quit 1 ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved it for 2 years - then it quit 1 month out of warranty. SquareTrade useless - tells me I bought coverage for the same 2 years provided by the manufacturer -replacement!?
customer_reviews.author: FJDT

customer_reviews.title: Replacement of an old Fellowes Shredder
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine. We finally had to replace a Fellowes that was 10+ years old. The only issue we have had is that once in a while, when we put too much paper in, the unjamming it is not as simple as pushing the reverse button.....It takes a little extra effort to get it to release the overload. Other than that, it is a good quality, fits in the office space we have well, and works great!
customer_reviews.author: P. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this for my office. We are currently at ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my office. We are currently at 25 staff and this shredder is used every day as it sits right next to our printer in the main office. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Leah Garber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the investment! Smooth and quiet. Large capacity of shredding at one time.
customer_reviews.author: metro2251

customer_reviews.title: We love it, we got it for a business and ...
customer_reviews.text: We love it, we got it for a business and so far is working great. I had a Fellowes before and had good luck so I stuck with same brand. easy to operate, price was pretty good. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Village of Arlington Heights Thomas Kuehne

customer_reviews.title: A real workhorse!
customer_reviews.text: I managed to destroy my previous shredder by shredding a few sheets of paper that (unknown to me) were attached via a paper clip. I didn't really want to spend a lot of money on a shredder, but I took the plunge on this one and have been very happy with it. I'm certainly more careful to remove any paper clips :), but this shredder has not blinked on anything reasonable I've shred.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E. Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Best Shredder On The Planet
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is the best one I have ever owned, the safest, the quietest and the most powerful. It is well worth the money. Very heavy item, be careful when un packing it and removing shipping bolts (see setup guide). Love it. Shreds cards and compact disks too ( no cards with chips or disks with chips though).
customer_reviews.author: Camerony

customer_reviews.title: Great for home business
customer_reviews.text: This is a little pricey for the homeowner but if you have an in house business and shred a large number of documents, I believe that this is a better device in the long run. With identity theft prevalent you can't be to careful.
customer_reviews.author: Johny Deere

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little shredder. Bought it for the office, and we have several years of files that have been put through this trooper, and it works like a champ. Is quiet for a shredder (all things are relative). Highly recommend this , much better than the last one we had!
customer_reviews.author: HarborSailor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast, it shreds everything very fast!
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Not fine cuts
customer_reviews.text: It works well. I you do not have sensitive documents is excellent. Large bin a plus. The problem is that information can be seen on cut. Too large. I hade to get a micro-cut version for sensitive documents. No I have two of them.
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Mosley

customer_reviews.title: So far so good with this shredder
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with this shredder. I purchased this shredder for a small office of about 30 people. It works as advertised and the cross-cut style shredding is very effective. The only negative is that it sometimes takes a second for the shredder to recognize that there is paper in the shredder. This may be due to the safety features. Other than that, this product has met all expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't jammed yet = greatest machine ever. What else can you ask for
customer_reviews.author: Spea

customer_reviews.title: Easy to empty
customer_reviews.text: What a work horse! Bought this for the office, it can really crank out a lot of volume. Even can do credit cards, CDs, staples, etc. Easy to empty, large capacity, easy to clear jams. Slim profile, attractive appearance!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Llama

customer_reviews.title: 40 minutes of shredding...boing
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I was very happy with this shredder. I followed the instructions, carefully oiled the machine, and successfully shredded one bag. Two days later I started to shred a second bag, but the machine stopped working; the thick rubber gasket that surrounds the paper slot was being sucked into the blades. Although Amazon accepted the return, it was not easy repacking such a heavy item (67 lbs) and "dropping" it off at the UPS store. I would have preferred a UPS package pickup, but I am going out of town. Cannot wait until Amazon starts using Sikorsky Sky Cranes to deliver and pickup heavy packages.
customer_reviews.author: Nine2234

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine!
customer_reviews.text: This Fellowes Powershred 125Ci shredder was purchased a month ago to replace the 3rd shredder our office has had in 3 years! We are very pleased, thus far, with the machine. It has a larger capacity than any of the past machines, It operates smoothly & has the anti jam ability. This anti jamming works great! Also, if hands get near paper opening..it stops shredding. It is not to noisy & it can be used for a longer period of time before needing to cool off. Love it! This machine makes quick work of our shredding needs!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Dee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my small business. Never jams or overheats
customer_reviews.author: Jamie P

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend it to a small business with a considerable amount ...
customer_reviews.text: Lives up to its description; doesn't jam and is capable of taking on the tough jobs. Would recommend it to a small business with a considerable amount of shredding.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Comilloni

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, great product! Life saver for people with lots of paperwork to shred. Use the oil!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: very nice lady answered
customer_reviews.text: Most expensive door stopper, forget customer service. Bought for home office in Mexico, overkill I know. Checked with them first, was told warranty is valid in Mexico as well. After shredding about 4000 sheets of aper over a week, heard a loud pop and it stopped working. Called customer support, very nice lady answered, took down info, gave me a case number, said someone will call me within 48 hours. After waiting 2 weeks called again, another nice lady apologized, assured me that I will be contacted within 48 hours. That was about 6 months ago. After my computer, this is the most expensive thing in my office and it helps keep the door open.
customer_reviews.author: laura ghaffari

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far its an amazing product, works great, no jams, no problems just chews everything
customer_reviews.author: Superuber

customer_reviews.title: annoying not what it is hyped up to be.
customer_reviews.text: 1st off don't buy any oil with it like amazon suggests. It comes with oil. 2. It acts like its jamming and overheating when you use auto feed, but when you actually reach over and push the feed button to feed paper through it works fine. Annoying to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Works great, my last fellowes shredder lasted several years under ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, my last fellowes shredder lasted several years under difficult treatment. This one is great I can throw larger envelopes in without having to open them first. Great way to quickly get rid of junk mail with my name on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the office for capacity. Works great, handles everything as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great fast delivery. Big improvement form or last shedder.
customer_reviews.author: Greg LaBree

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find an American made quality shredder. .. This is my second one .. the first one lasted eight years and is still going. .. just a little tired. My small office shreds about 200 to 400 pages a day. Great machine!!
customer_reviews.author: Flip

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Good machine, quiet, and strong. Narrow design is very nice for our environment. Handles big bundles of paper, and we don't have to remove staples.
customer_reviews.author: jOHN o.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shredder
customer_reviews.text: Excellent slender shape for office. best feature: will shred an entire junk mail piece without having to open it and remove parts at a time. Waste basket very easy to remove. Anti-jam feature works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Art W.

customer_reviews.title: The best one I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Came from a Staples 8 page shredder that handled more like 3 pages at a time and upgraded to this Fellows Powershred unit. Clearly a 400% upgrade and very happy I did. Has not jammed in the first month of use even with unopened credit card junk mail offers, stapled docs of 15+ pages, love the large trash bin and very easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence R.

customer_reviews.title: So good, we bought a second one!
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is well worth the price! Our company has never had an issue or a problem with our shredder. It's so good and reliable, we bought a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca

customer_reviews.title: Shredder
customer_reviews.text: The shredder is great. It shreds quickly and quietly. It fits the office needs space and use wise. The office is very happy and satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Dinella

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Plug module fell out. Drawer sensor malfunctioned. Unit stopped working. Dissatisfied with Fellows customer service.
customer_reviews.author: TX Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: First shipment was damaged but received replacement in 5 days! Works like a charm and is much quieter than my old, smaller shredder! Pleased with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Townsend

customer_reviews.title: this is a monster work horse. fits the end ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a monster work horse. fits the end of your desk, and takes all you want fior a small business.
customer_reviews.author: pmorlimont

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was defective. Heavy unit to keep replacing. Was returned but complicated.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: so far so good, love the cross cut for security
customer_reviews.text: so far so good, love the cross cut for security. Product is very handy for shredding boxes of year end paperwork.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Moore

customer_reviews.title: best shredder ever
customer_reviews.text: we have gone through 3 shredders in the last 2 years...finally we tried this one wow what a difference, fast, sturdy, well made! totally worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: ... needed a shredder that wouldn't jam and this is perfect. Very large and shreds everything
customer_reviews.text: I needed a shredder that wouldn't jam and this is perfect. Very large and shreds everything. If you want a shredder that will really work great this is the one to buy.
customer_reviews.author: iowadavid

customer_reviews.title: Good cross-cut shredder!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this in my office for about 2 years now, and it is still working well. And, the reverse still works! So often, that is the first thing to quit on a shredder and this one is going strong. One tip:keep oiling it- it really helps!
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for small office
customer_reviews.text: This has been perfect for my small office of 5 people. Great size too. Holds a decent amount of shred waste, so you don't constantly have to change the bags.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: ... in the company came in to do training and loved this shredder so much that she spent about two ...
customer_reviews.text: A higher-up in the company came in to do training and loved this shredder so much that she spent about two hours of my training shredding paper.s Not only is it great for shredding papers, but it also apparently is excellent at stress relief.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Fellowes Powershred 125Ci
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect for our office. It also is faster.
customer_reviews.author: KADIFE KOYUNCU

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shredder
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent shredder for a small office environment. We wanted a cross-cut shredder that would allow us to shred boxes of old paperwork in fairly short order and this met the need. It's very quite and I like the fact that it handles staples and paperclips with ease. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Very good for small offices!
customer_reviews.text: Machine is easy to use and operates VERY QUIETLY. Used by 5 to 6 different operators with no difficulty in output quality. However, the Fellowes 125Ci will jam if one attempts to shred more than 25 sheets (20 weight bond) at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ford

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Excellent & Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our office, 38 employees use this machine, almost runs all day for 5 days a week, works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: hbkscorpio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great, just wish it would fit under the counter of my desk.
customer_reviews.author: zadie

customer_reviews.title: glad I have it
customer_reviews.text: I bought primarily to shred junk mail. Handles most but balks at thicker envelopes etc. All the same, glad I have it ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Sgt Friendly

customer_reviews.title: Review of FELLOWES Powershred 125Ci Heavy Duty.
customer_reviews.text: The FELLOWES Powershred 125Ci was delivered on time and it exceeded expectations regarding its performance. It is easy to use, effective and efficient (its 18-sheet capacity saves a lot of time with respect to other models of lesser processing capacity) and its cross-cut system properly preserve the confidentiality of the information that was contained in the documents being shredded.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent shredder. It is fast and does not jam. A good shredder is a great time saver.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!
customer_reviews.text: This unit is perfect for the person who is tired of doing one sheet at a time. It definitely does even more than 20 sheets at a time...with no struggle. Very quiet too. If space is a problem...suck it up. I like the fact I don't have to empty it as often. So if you have the room...go for it! Safety shut off feature is pretty cool too.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great Shredder...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for in this case. It is a strong shredder and does the job good. Like it just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Par

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be a work horse.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, responsive. Auto on and off. While still too early to tell, it appears to be a workhorse! Much improved over a prior Fellowes shredder.
customer_reviews.author: A. W. Bradburd

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my home office. It's works great and it has two wheels so moving around was easy. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: dina

customer_reviews.title: Protect your identity with ease
customer_reviews.text: No more pulling staples or feeding in documents or mail one sheet at a time. This monster will eat 18 sheets at once and mulches staples and paperclips with the paper. Safe around our 2 yr old, as it shuts off when a finger touches surface near opening. We got this for the home, as we were tired of wimpy shredders. This one truly Rocks!!! They actually sent the 125ci, as a replacement for this one which is no longer available.
customer_reviews.author: David H

customer_reviews.title: Quality quirks taken care of by Fellowes
customer_reviews.text: We had this 3 days and the socket where the power cord plugs into the shredder broke. BUT Fellowes customer service is superb! I called them up and they are dealing with it in a way that completely satisfies me.
customer_reviews.author: nitmd

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for our small office
customer_reviews.text: This machine IS a beast. It's perfect for our small office.
customer_reviews.author: BDeierling

customer_reviews.title: ... this shredder for the office and everyone is very pleased with its performance
customer_reviews.text: We are using this shredder for the office and everyone is very pleased with its performance.
customer_reviews.author: Maria F. Green

customer_reviews.title: plastic part broke after about a month
customer_reviews.text: shreds great but cheap plastic part broke after maybe a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Chap

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product to anyone who has a lot of paper to shred.
customer_reviews.text: After all these years buying the cheap ones that jam whenever you use them. Should have started with this one from the start. Big bucks but worth every penny just from the lack of aggravation standpoint.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce D. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: High powered
customer_reviews.text: Does everything the description says it will -- continuous shredding without resting, quick shredding, etc. A serious addition to the workplace.
customer_reviews.author: C. B. Mattick

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a small office
customer_reviews.text: Good size and handles my needs for a small office
customer_reviews.author: Audry Craft

customer_reviews.title: Powershreding
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to shred boxes of old documents. This machine made quick work of the shredding. 5 stars ...powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest W.

customer_reviews.title: Claims Seem True
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We've only had this shredder a few weeks. So far it does what it claims, up to 18 pages at a time and no jams. It's pretty noisy, but we can live with that.
customer_reviews.author: M. Harris

customer_reviews.title: A shredder that really works !
customer_reviews.text: Powerful shredder. Works great. Do not be afraid of a let down on this one. It is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: JEFF STEELE

customer_reviews.title: Great shredder
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is meeting my office's needs perfectly. It's powerful and efficient. It is used on a daily basis and shreds over 20 sheets at one time. No jamming at all!! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Sandahl

customer_reviews.title: Great shredder for work
customer_reviews.text: Great shredder for work. Cost a lot but I always say if you misplace one piece of customer info, it will cost you more than the cost of a great shredder. Don't buy other shredders that to strip cuts or have low paper capacity. Otherwise you will waste man hours of your staff feeding through a few sheets a time. With this shredder you can feed about 15 to 18 pages no problem.
customer_reviews.author: So Cal Dad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shredder for a small office.
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job quickly and effortlessly. So far extremely happy with the shredder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our office staff loves it. Cuts down on frequent ...
customer_reviews.text: Our office staff loves it. Cuts down on frequent changing out trash liner and/or shredding more than one to two sheets of paper. Also, can shred other important items that we would not want to throw out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product but poorly packaged
customer_reviews.text: The product I would give 5 stars, but the packaging 1. They came in damaged 2 times and I kept the 2nd with minor damage. The 125Ci is excellent shredder and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Kinsel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: very good prower machine, its quite and so far is working very well in the office. we will see if it can make thru the year
customer_reviews.author: guillermo fong

customer_reviews.title: Large Capacity! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this shredder for a small business. It holds a lot before needing emptied. Awesome purchase for my company's needs.
customer_reviews.author: GSS-OFFMAN

product_meta.title: Fellowes Powershred 125Ci 100% Jam Proof 20-Sheet Cross-Cut Commercial Grade Paper Shredder,Black
product_meta.description: Style:125CiThe Fellowes Powershred 125Ci Cross-Cut Shredder can shred up to 18 sheets of paper per pass into 397 (5/32” x 1-1/2” Security Level P-4) cross-cut particles. This machine also safely shreds CDs/DVDs, credit cards, staples, paper clips and junk mail. Achieve hassle-free shredding with all of the features the 125Ci has to offer. Get three levels of advanced jam prevention with Fellowes 100% Jam Proof System which eliminates paper jams, powers through tough jobs and maximizes productivity. To protect more than your identity, the patented SafeSense Technology is designed with an electronic safety sensor that surrounds the paper entry and automatically disables the shredder when hands touch the paper opening. Also, the 125Ci’s SilentShred Technology and Energy Savings System allow this machine to integrate easily to any environment. With the ability to shred continuously for up to 45 minutes before needing a 45-minute cool down period, the 125Ci is ideal for 1-5 users and includes a 14-gallon pull-out bin. Backed by a worry-free 2-year product and service warranty plus lifetime cutter warranty. 28.9” H x 11.25” W x 21.1” D
feature_bullets: Item dimensions – 11.25” W x 21.06” D x 28.94” H | Cut size – 5/32” x 1 ½” | Cut type – Cross-out | Sheet Capacity – 20 | Bin Capacity – 14 gallons | Paper entry – 9” W | Speed (feet per minute) – 16 | Shreds per sheet – 397
Shreds staples, credit cards, paper clips, CDs/DVDs or junk mail | Light will indicate when bin is full
SilentShred Offers ultra-quiet performance for shared workspaces | SafeSense Automatically stops shredding when hands or paws touch the paper entry
The Fellowes 125Ci delivers three levels of advanced jam prevention with the patented 100 percent Jam Proof System | Continuous run time for up to 45 minutes before a cool down period is needed
This item’s packaging will indicate what is inside and cannot be hidden

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
